website_summaries.verdict: The sleek and stylish design, sturdy yet flexible insole and the aggressive outsole of the Saucony Caliber TR have earned many followers in the market. Its long-term durability and the reasonable price make it a decent choice for most neutral runners who are looking for a rugged trail running shoe to sustain various challenging surfaces.
pros: According to the majority, the Saucony Caliber TR is a reasonably comfortable shoe
Most of the runners were happy with the lightweight disposition of the shoe since it apparently increased the efficiency of their runs
Several customers noticed that the upper was highly breathable
their feet remained cool and dry while they were out on the trails
A few purchasers appreciated the overall look of the shoe by calling it ‘stylish’
A wearer said that he loved the ‘glove-like’ fit of the upper
cons: Some customers had problems with the sizing scheme of the shoe
A user was of the opinion that the shoe was not sufficiently durable as its condition quickly deteriorated after only several miles of running

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These are poser running shoes...not at all good for actual running if you are used to wearing saucony's. Really disappointed...thin sole...thin uppers, and not that snug arch support of saucony progrid guide or trail shoes. Big bummer.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaCEHills

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and rugged
customer_reviews.text: I only wear Saucony to run. Recently started running outside, mainly a steep bridge and needed something a bit more rugged as I was slipping a bit when it rained. These are very light weight, yet they have excellent traction. They are comfortable and I love the laces! All sneakers should have these types of laces. They are a prefect length and textured to not unravel.
customer_reviews.author: K Lamel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, true to size
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, true to size, and great colors. I'm a personal trainer and wear them for running, weight lifting and training clients. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Arnow

customer_reviews.title: Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: These are so chintzy, my husband has Saucony sneakers and I wanted a pair for myself but when these arrived they looked like something from a bargain store. Not what I was expecting at all!
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Good Local Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like this sneaker and admit I bought it for the color. It's not as well padded as my other Saucony Cohesion that I bought and reviewed. It's good for light walking yet I don't think I'd use it for running or a volksmarch (6 miles)
customer_reviews.author: Donna. Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Nothing not to like. I love Saucony shoes and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: coffeelover

customer_reviews.title: one shoe 9. 5 & the other 8. ...
customer_reviews.text: one shoe 9.5 & the other 8.5 but they changed the inside tag for me ,not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I hope and run off road. I always get the Saucony brand. Always good fit good quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Greene

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe , hate the insoles ! Insoles we're too short for shoe . Seemed like 9.5 insoles in a 10 size shoe . Contemplated sending shoe back . Ultimately decided to add extra insole to compensate for difference . Please match insoles to shoe ! I love my Saucony shoes , 3rd. pair .
customer_reviews.author: tygerlil11

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for working out
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for working out. I'm generally a 10 but always have to get an 11 in this brand. It makes the stair master a little harder to use because the shoe is so big... But overall great arch support and they look very cool.
customer_reviews.author: HWoodsShopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely THE most comfortable sneaks I own!! Fit perfect and VERY comfortable foot bed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Almiragus

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these shoes based on a pair of Saucony's ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes based on a pair of Saucony's I own. These shoes are, unfortunately, too narrow and I plan to return them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Saucony Women's Caliber Tr Running Shoe
product_meta.description: You need a force to battle the trails with, so we introduce to you the caliber TR. This ride features an aggressive outsole, combined with our react2u sock liner with memory foam to help you comfortably fly through your gait cycle.
feature_bullets: Trail-designed athletic shoe with heavy-duty segmented sole, padded collar, and reinforced heel and toe
